name: The Lineage of Manny Cruz
description:
The Lineage of Manny Cruz

Story:

You play as Manny Cruz, a student who needs to complete a family tree project. He has trouble researching his ancestors, but he ends up learning about them in a different way.

Gameplay:

This game has a linear story that is click-through. But it is also a fast-paced puzzle game.

Controls:

Usually, you're prompted on how to use the controls. But just in case you need the controls for the puzzle:

Move cursor: W, A, S, D

Swap blocks: ENTER

Add row of blocks from bottom: SPACE
